thread.title: Better Baltimore B&Bs association working to, naturally, make Baltimore better

author: Darcy Costello
title: Better Baltimore B&Bs association working to, naturally, make Baltimore better
text:
Better Baltimore B&Bs association working to, naturally, make Baltimore better Scarborough Fair B&B Courtesy of Scarborough Fair B&B 
Scarborough Fair B&B, 801 S. Charles Street, hopes guests will spend savings on two-night stays at the bed and breakfast at local Baltimore businesses. 
Scarborough Fair B&B, 801 S. Charles Street, hopes guests will spend savings on two-night stays at the bed and breakfast at local Baltimore businesses. (Courtesy of Scarborough Fair B&B) By Darcy Costello The Baltimore Sun Local bed-and-breakfasts offer deals designed to encourage spending, donations. Better Baltimore B&Bs are trying to make Baltimore, well, better. 
Following the city's April unrest, the Better Baltimore Bed and Breakfasts , a group of like-minded local B&Bs, decided they wanted to do something to help restore their community.
